Going through the list again, the sum of all purchase transactions is: 8,395,770.00

The sum of all depreciation is: 91,509.94

Therefore, the total cost is: 8,395,770.00 + 24,230.00 + 91,509.94 = 8,511,509.94

Rounding to 2 decimal places: 8,511,509.94
